rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: A modest entrance hall leading to living areas and the kitchen.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with natural lighting and open design for family gatherings. Adheres to Vastu by positioning windows on the east side.

rooms.name: dining_area
rooms.description: Dining area adjacent to the living room with a view of the garden for social interactions.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with essential appliances and storage, placed in the southeast corner per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: guest_room
rooms.description: Guest bedroom equipped with a small balcony overlooking the garden.

rooms.name: primary_bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious primary bedroom with a private balcony and ensuite bathroom for privacy.

rooms.name: study
rooms.description: Small study room ideal for work or children's homework, located near the living area.

rooms.name: bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom serving the primary bedroom and guest areas.

additional_features.name: swimming_pool
additional_features.description: Contemporary swimming pool integrated into the garden area with efficient water recycling system.

additional_features.name: spacious balconies
additional_features.description: Each bedroom features a spacious balcony with seating and greenery, enhancing natural ventilation and views.
